thread.title: Lower48 restaurant in Denver to close Nov. 7 after two years
thread.title_full: Lower48 restaurant in Denver to close Nov. 7 after two years

title: Lower48 restaurant in Denver to close Nov. 7 after two years
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
Lower48, a much-praised restaurant near Coors Field, is closing its doors just shy of its second anniversary....
